full_summary:
# E60HN-16ELEC Stream 1 9.5 UPS Tender Announcement
==============================================

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01018411
**Solicitation Number**: 1000414874
**Publication Date**: December 22, 2022
**Closing Date**: January 4, 2023, at 13:00:00

**Tender Status**: Expiré

## Overview

Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking a supplier to provide Uninterruptible Power Supplies (UPS) under the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HN-16ELEC.

## Project Details

* **Location**: Ottawa, ON
* **Delivery Deadline**: March 31, 2023
* **Quantity**: To be determined based on contract requirements

## Pre-qualification Requirements

* Suppliers must hold a valid Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).
* Only pre-qualified suppliers have been invited to submit a bid.

## Contract Details

* **Contract Type**: Supply Arrangement
* **Supplier Selection Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to Canadian suppliers and eligible under the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Canada Border Services Agency
* **Address**: 333 North River Road, Ottawa, ON K1L 8B9, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Gordie Hrehirchuk
* **Email**: gordie.hrehirchuk@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 902-943-1854

* [Tender Notice (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/22/4be7a129
